channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Uncollected waste bins in 2 areas of Sutton Place, 17th August
item.description:
There is a second pile of uncollected bin bags sitting opposite another large pile of uncollected bins on the street - again attracting vermin and public urination.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sutton Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piles of rubbish, litter and detritus on residential street, 17th August
item.description:
Just wanted to report the rubbish situation outside near my house. Since moving in, I’ve never seen the bin area clear or tidy it’s always overflowing and people keep leaving random things there (right now there’s even a broken shopping trolley). It’s a real eyesore and makes the place feel really messy, it’s attracting more rodents. I’d be grateful if something could be done about it please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Derwent Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncollected garden waste now attracting vermin, litter and urination, 17th August
item.description:
These bags have been here over a week and are now providing a fly tipping area and people are urinating on the bags.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sutton Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two motorhomes on our road, 17th August
item.description:
We have two motorhomes on our road with someone living in them. The smell of urine from them emptying is not acceptable. This is a public road not a campsite. Also by them parking there and not moving people cannot park and now have to park by dropdown curbs, this is causing problems with trying to drive down the street and not being able to pass the cars parked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerset Avenue, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet
